waypoints.onLoad:
local elements = { [ELE_WIND] = 'Wind', [ELE_WATER] = 'Water', [ELE_FIRE] = 'Fire', [ELE_EARTH] = 'Earth', } local element, level
repeat
element = tonumber (chooseList (elements, 'choose element')) level = chooseNumber (2, 5, 'choose level')
fuseElements (element, level, 3)
until not chooseFlag ('restart?', true)
